name: Electro-Node
description:
A simple puzzle game where you need to connect things together in order to light up the level.

Featuring
  • Simple to understand mechanics
  • Difficult to solve puzzles
  • Multiple playable characters
  • A little dude! (He's just a little guy)

Controls
  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Z - Undo
  • R - Restart level
  • Esc - Leave Level
  • M - Mute
Reviews
  • Of all the current games out there... - Bab Chunko
Price
  • Free of charge
 Libraries
  • Tick
  • Classic
  • Json
Pallette
  • Bare Copper
 Misc.
  • The levels are made in Tiled, so if there is some interest in it I could add a way to make/load custom levels
  • Also the source code GitHub if you want to check it out
